elements.label: sub_sub_sec
elements.text:
Part I: Information concerning the procurement procedure
and the contracting authority or contracting entity

elements.label: para
elements.text: For procurement procedures in which a call for competition has been published in

elements.label: para
elements.text: the Official Journal of the European Union, the information required under Part I

elements.label: para
elements.text: will be automatically retrieved, provided that the electronic ESPD-service is used

elements.label: para
elements.text: to generate and fill in the ESPD. Reference of the relevant notice published in the

elements.label: para
elements.text: Official Journal of the European Union:

elements.label: para
elements.text: In case publication of a notice in the Official Journal of the European Union is not

elements.label: para
elements.text: required, please give other information allowing the procurement procedure to be

elements.label: para
elements.text: unequivocally identified (e. g. reference of a publication at national level)

elements.label: para
elements.text: Consultancy Service Agreement for the construction of a new hydroelectric power

elements.label: para
elements.text: plant for the supply of Qasigiannguit and Aasiaat, Greenland

elements.label: para
elements.text: NunaGreen Construction Disco Bay A/S (“NunaGreen”) is tendering for a

elements.label: para
elements.text: Consultancy Service Agreement for the construction of a new hydroelectric power

elements.label: para
elements.text: plant for the supply of Qasigiannguit and Aasiaat, Greenland (“the Project”). The

elements.label: para
elements.text: Service Agreement includes consultancy services in connection with the Project.

elements.label: para
elements.text: The requirements for the services and contract terms are further detailed in the

elements.label: para
elements.text: File reference number attributed by the contracting authority or
